data.title: What kind of Counter-Strike fan are you?
data.description:
Answer 8 simple situations from Counter-Strike matches and fan atmospheres‚Äîand find out what kind of fan you are: a master strategist, a cautious tactician, an energetic fan, or a cheerful observer.
The quiz is designed to give everyone a taste of the tournament atmosphere‚Äîwhether you're a player or just enjoy watching highlights.
data.firstPage: 8 easy questions ‚Üí choose an option ‚Üí get your fan type

resultMessages.0-4:
A cheerful observer üòé
You come for entertainment and the thrill of the game itself. You follow the matches, cheer with a smile, joke with friends‚Äîthe main thing is to have fun, and who wins is secondary.
resultMessages.4-7:
Energetic Fan üî•
You live the match to the fullest! Every hit, explosion, or clutch action evokes a storm of emotion. You energize the atmosphere and are always on the team's side with great enthusiasm.
resultMessages.8-8:
Cautious Tactician üõ°Ô∏è
You prefer to observe and carefully assess the situation. You enjoy understanding what's happening on the map and anticipating teams' moves. Your style is calm and accurate predictions.
resultMessages.9-13:
Master of Strategy üéØ
You see the game several steps ahead! You analyze maps, teams, and tactics. Even if you're not playing, you sense where the key moment is and how the match might turn out.

quizInfo.firstText:
You've completed our CS quiz‚Äîand your score shows what kind of Counter-Strike fan you are. üéÆ
You've felt the atmosphere of the matches, experienced moments where every shot can change everything, and demonstrated your unique fan vibe. Whether you play or just enjoy watching tournaments, your support style deserves attention!
quizInfo.partnerBonus:
Our partners have prepared a special bonus for you. This is a gift especially for participants who truly love the atmosphere of sports, emotions, and fan competitions.
It's available now. You can claim it at any time‚Äîit's just waiting for you.

questions.text: When you hear the word ‚ÄúCounter-Strike,‚Äù what comes to mind?

answers.text: I immediately think of moments when someone scores a clutch!
The games, the noise of the stadium, the commentators.
Clubs and games and times when we ‚Äújust play.‚Äù

questions.text: Imagine: the final of a major tournament. What are you doing?

answers.text: I'm watching live and reliving every second!
I'll turn on the TV if I have time.
I don't follow tournaments, but it's great that they exist.

questions.text: Your friend makes an incredible shot in the game. Reaction?

answers.text: I scream like it's a major final.
What... is that really that hard?

questions.text: Situation: one player remains against three. You...

answers.text: I live in hope: "Come on, brother!"
I watch more closely: I wonder what will happen.

questions.text: A map appears before the match. How do you feel?

answers.text: Each map has its own vibe, and I like to guess the scenario.
If I know the map, it's already interesting.
Sometimes I get confused, but I still watch it.
They all look the same to me.

questions.text: The commentators start to stir things up. You...

answers.text: I'm energized, it's getting more fun.
It's a bit loud in places, but I'm listening.
I turn off the sound or just ignore it.

questions.text: You're offered a "roll." What's your answer?

answers.text: We can, if you have time.
It's not a given, but it could be.
I'm more interested in watching than playing.

questions.text: After a tense match, the team loses. What's going on inside?

answers.text: A little sad, but okay‚Äîpart of the game.
Well, that happens. Better next time.
The main thing is that the highlights are cool.

data.title: League of Legends is a fan challenge
data.description: Answer 8 situations from matches and fan atmospheres, and find out what kind of fan you are: a master strategist, a cautious tactician, an energetic fan, or a cheerful observer. There are no right or wrong answers‚Äîonly emotions and fun!
data.firstPage:
8 questions ‚Äì choose one option for each.
Each option is worth 0 to 3 points.
At the end of the quiz, your score will reflect your team support style and your fan vibe!

resultMessages.0-4:
A cheerful observer üòÑ
It's important for you to enjoy the atmosphere of the game and the team's emotions. Things don't always go according to plan, but laughter, jokes, and support make you the heart of the fans.
resultMessages.4-7:
Energetic Fan ‚ö°
You play or watch a match with emotion! You love action-packed moments, combos, and unexpected turns of events. The main thing is to enjoy the process, even if things don't go according to plan.
resultMessages.8-8:
Cautious Tactician üéØ
You closely monitor events on the map and strive to make the right decisions. Sometimes you take the initiative, sometimes you observe, but you are always aware of what's happening.
resultMessages.9-13:
Master of Strategy üß†
You see the game like the palm of your hand! You love to think through every move, anticipate your team's actions, and control the pace of the match. A true strategist and a champion of teamwork.

quizInfo.firstText:
You completed our LoL Fan Challenge‚Äîand your answers revealed the kind of fan you are!
We analyzed your reaction style, emotions, and gaming preferences‚Äîand here's who you are in the League of Legends fan world:
quizInfo.partnerBonus:
Our partners have prepared a special bonus for you. This is a gift especially for participants who truly love the atmosphere of sports, emotions, and fan competitions.
It's available now. You can claim it at any time‚Äîit's just waiting for you.

questions.text: When watching a LoL match, what interests you most?

answers.text: How teams strategize and use champions
The atmosphere of the spectators and fans
Funny and unexpected events on the field

questions.text: Which role in a game or watching a match appeals to you?

answers.text: Strategist - I like to plan and follow the flow of the game
Sniper - I love decisive moments and precise actions
Support - I like to help and observe the team
Any role - the main thing is that it's fun and interesting

questions.text: How do you react when your team is losing the first few minutes?

answers.text: I stay calm and wait for the right moment to counterattack
I turn on the energy and try to turn the game around
I'm a fan in the stands ‚Äì I'm rooting for them until the very end
I laugh at weird moments and funny situations

questions.text: What moment in a match is the most exciting?

answers.text: The fans get the crowd going and put on a show
Funny bugs, jokes, and unexpected moments

questions.text: When a team wins a tournament, you...

answers.text: Become a super fan, relive every moment
Laugh and share memes about the victory

questions.text: What helps you better understand the game?

answers.text: Watching strategy guides and analytical reviews
Following match highlights and top moments
The atmosphere and emotions of the team on stage

questions.text: How do you react when your favorite champion loses a fight?

answers.text: I analyze my mistakes and look for solutions
I fight to the end and try to turn the tide
I support my team, worrying with them
I laugh and look for funny moments in the game

questions.text: If you were a match commentator, your style would be...

answers.text: Humorous and lighthearted, with memes and reactions

data.title: Dota: Test your gaming intuition!
data.description: Answer eight questions about Dota matches and atmosphere, and discover your fan type: a true gamer, a tactical observer, an emotional fan, or a curious newbie. There are no right or wrong answers‚Äîonly fun, emotion, and your perception of the game!
data.firstPage:
8 questions, choose one option at a time.
Each option is worth 0 to 3 points.
At the end of the quiz, your total points will reflect your Dota vibe and approach to the game and matches.

resultMessages.0-4:
Curious Newbie üëÄ
You're just getting started with Dota. You're watching, listening, learning‚Äîbut your interest already speaks volumes about your potential.
resultMessages.4-7:
Emotional Fan ‚ö°
You value emotion, chaos, and fun. You don't always follow the strategy, but you enjoy the game and the spectacle.
resultMessages.8-8:
Tactical Observer üß†
You understand Dota, enjoy watching tournaments, and know what's happening. You have good intuition and a good feel for the game.
resultMessages.9-13:
A true gamer üéÆ
You feel Dota even if you don't always play. You know the basic strategies, moments, and atmosphere of matches‚Äîyour intuition is almost like a pro's!

quizInfo.firstText:
You've completed our Dota quiz‚Äîand you did it in style!
Your answers revealed how you truly capture the game's atmosphere: the emotions, the strategies, the moments that make your heart beat faster.
Each choice in the quiz is a small detail in your gaming profile, and now we know what kind of Dota vibe you truly have inside.
quizInfo.partnerBonus:
To celebrate your participation, our partners have prepared an exclusive gift for you, available only to quiz participants.
Claim it now‚Äîit's already activated.

questions.text: What do you like most about Dota?

answers.text: Funny moments and unexpected events in the game
I've only heard the name and understand a little bit

questions.text: What role in the game do you find most interesting?

answers.text: Any role, as long as there's fun and unexpected moments
The one who helps the team save the fight (support/support
The one who leads the team to victory (carry/leader)
I don't know, I'm just observing

questions.text: What makes a Dota match exciting?

answers.text: Beautiful hero combinations and map moments
Funny situations and awkward player mistakes
I'm not interested in the game

questions.text: When does a match become especially tense?

answers.text: In the final minutes and fights for the main points
When major tournaments showcase great players
When someone makes an unexpected move

questions.text: What influences a team's victory the most?
What do you watch most often?

answers.text: Live matches of friends or popular streamers

questions.text: What's more important to you in a game/match?

answers.text: Emotions and the atmosphere of the match
I don't care, I just watch

questions.text: How would you describe your style in Dota?

answers.text: Strategist and visionary ‚Äì I like to think ahead
Team player ‚Äì I like to help and support
Adventurer ‚Äì I enjoy chaos and fun
Spectator ‚Äì I like to watch, but I don't want to play

data.title: Basketball Challenge
data.description: Test your basketball intuition! Find out what you find most exciting about the game, who scores the winning basket most often, and which moments evoke the most excitement. And finally, find out what kind of basketball expert you are!
data.firstPage: Answer 8 simple questions‚Äîchoose the option that best suits you. At the end, you'll discover your playing style and level of athletic intuition.

resultMessages.1:
Basketball Master
You sense the dynamics of the game, understand the pace and emotions. You have a real talent for spotting the right moments in the sport!
resultMessages.2:
A sharpshooter
You're confident in Asian basketball‚Äîwith a little practice, you're the one who knows the end of a game.
resultMessages.3:
Calm Tactician
You don't fuss, but respond thoughtfully and attentively. This style suits those who enjoy observing the game from the inside.
resultMessages.4:
Emotional Fan
You choose with your soul‚Äîbrightly, honestly, and truly! For you, basketball is, first and foremost, about emotion and drive.

quizInfo.firstText:
You have an excellent sense of pace, emotion, and those moments that decide the outcome of a match.
You have a keen sense of the game, grasp the atmosphere, and spot the hidden plot twist. This approach is rare! Keep up the good work: your intuition makes sporting events even more exciting.
quizInfo.partnerBonus:
Our partners have prepared a special bonus for you. This is a small gift for participants who truly love sports and excitement.

It's available now. You can claim it anytime‚Äîit's just waiting for you.

questions.text: What happens most often in basketball?

answers.text: Everything in a row, the game is fast!

answers.text: When the fans get the crowd going

answers.text: The one who's in a good mood today

questions.text: Which situation evokes the most emotion?

answers.text: All of these factors combined make the best combo

answers.text: The one with the most desire
The one with the best roster

data.title: Baseball: Test Your Sports Intuition!
data.description:
Test your baseball intuition! ‚öæ
Choose what you find most exciting about the game, how players and fans react, and what most often decides the outcome of a match. And at the end, find out what kind of baseball expert you are!
data.firstPage: Answer 8 simple questions‚Äîchoose the option that best suits you. At the end, you'll discover your playing style and level of athletic intuition.

resultMessages.1:
Dominant Player ‚öæ
You have a great feel for the game and often anticipate key moments. Your sense of baseball is almost like that of a professional coach. The main thing is to use your intuition and enjoy the game!
resultMessages.2:
Tactical Fan ü•é
You closely follow strategy and know when to make a clever move. Not every difficult situation is a challenge, but your analytical approach brings results.
resultMessages.3:
Adrenaline junkie ‚ö°
You value excitement and the speed of the game. Every round is a little adventure. The most important thing is the drive and enjoyment of the process, even if your predictions sometimes go wrong.
resultMessages.4:
Newbie Observer üëÄ
You're just beginning to discover the world of baseball and sometimes get lost in the rules. But curiosity and a desire to learn help you develop your intuition and quickly get a full feel for the game.

quizInfo.firstText: You passed our baseball quiz - your answer style showed what kind of player you are at heart.

Claim it right now‚Äîit's already activated.

data.title: Your perfect holiday in Asia
data.description: Find out what type of Asian holiday suits you best: beach relaxation, mountain adventures, urban exploration, or cultural tours.
data.firstPage: Answer 8 simple questions and choose the option that best suits you. At the end, you'll find out your vacation type.

resultMessages.1: Beach Relaxation ‚Äì You love the sun, sea, and tranquility. Your ideal vacation is on the ocean shore with a cocktail in hand.
resultMessages.2: Mountain Adventures ‚Äì You're active and love movement. Mountain trails, hiking, and adventure are your style.
resultMessages.3: Urban Exploration - You love action, cultural discoveries, and bustling streets. You enjoy exploring cities and their life.
resultMessages.4: Cultural Tours ‚Äì You're drawn to history, traditions, and new experiences. Your strength lies in immersing yourself in local culture and discovering new things.

quizInfo.firstText:
Congratulations ‚Äì you've just completed our "Your Ideal Asian Vacation" quiz!
Every choice you make reveals your unique travel personality: whether it's beach relaxation, mountain adventures, urban exploration, or cultural tours.
quizInfo.partnerBonus:
Our partners have prepared a special gift for you‚Äîa small bonus in honor of your excellent result! This is exclusive to quiz participants and is available for a limited time.

Don't delay‚Äîclaim your gift now!

questions.text: How does your ideal vacation begin?

answers.text: A stroll through the bustling city streets

A light breakfast on the beach

answers.text: Learning new things, learning about history

answers.text: Family or friends interested in culture

answers.text: Metro, taxi, local transportation in the city

questions.text: What's your vacation meal like?

answers.text: Variable, so you can enjoy variety
Cool in the mountains, fresh air

questions.text: What vacation rhythm do you prefer?

answers.text: Balanced, alternating between relaxation and excursions

data.title: What does your inner world sound like?
data.description: Find out what lies behind your mood and habits‚Äîcalm, drive, exuberance, or joyful chaos? This easy quiz will reveal which lifestyle is best for you.
data.firstPage: Answer 8 simple questions‚Äîchoose the option that resonates with you. At the end, you'll discover your personality type: Strategist, Driver, Courageous, or Chaotic. There are no right answers‚Äîjust your unique energy.

resultMessages.1: Calm Strategist‚ÄîYou analyze and plan, remaining level-headed even in chaos. Others appreciate your confidence and calm.
resultMessages.2: Energetic Driver - You love movement and activity, energizing those around you. You take initiative and create a buzz around you.
resultMessages.3: Courageous courage ‚Äì You're not afraid of challenges and risks, and you act decisively even in difficult situations. People are inspired by your courage.
resultMessages.4: Merry Chaos ‚Äì Joy and fun are your top priorities! Jokes, improvisation, and unexpected twists make you the life of the party.

quizInfo.firstText:
Congratulations! You've just demonstrated your unique inner style‚Äîand it's truly impressive! üòé
You balance energy, courage, and fun, a quality everyone appreciates.
quizInfo.partnerBonus: To make your discovery even more enjoyable, our partners have prepared an exclusive gift for you‚Äîavailable only to quiz participants! üéâ

questions.text: How do you start your morning?

answers.text: I check social media to see what's going on.
I drop everything and go for a run/workout.
I immediately turn on an energetic song and dance.
Quietly with a cup of tea and some music.

questions.text: What do you do if you're late for an important meeting?

answers.text: I try to convince everyone I'm not late.
I push through any way I can, even if it's chaos.
I run, jump, and try to lift my spirits and those around me.
I calmly plan how to get there without stress.

questions.text: What's your ideal weekend?

answers.text: Plans change every hour‚Äîand that's fun.

questions.text: What do you prefer in an argument?

answers.text: Make jokes and distract them until the argument is forgotten.
Turn on my charisma, convincing everyone with a smile.

questions.text: What's your favorite way to relax?

answers.text: Funny memes and videos on social media.
Meditation or a bath with essential oils.

questions.text: How do you react to the unexpected?

answers.text: I laugh first, then I decide.
I do everything I can to cope, even if it's chaotic.
I accept it as a challenge and turn on the drive.

questions.text: If you were a superhero, what would your style be?
How do you choose your vacation?

answers.text: The comfort of home or nature.

data.title: ‚ö° What superpower would suit you in real life?
data.description:
No capes or saving the world‚Äîjust real life and real ""superpowers""! Answer 8 fun questions and discover what lies within you: the patience of Buddha, maximum charisma, or the ability to disappear from boring chats.
üí¨ There are no right answers‚Äîjust your style and a little irony.

resultMessages.1:
Master of Calm üßò‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è

You don't seek out drama‚Äîyou turn off notifications.
Even when there's chaos all around, you remain a Zen master who can survive traffic jams, deadlines, and series finale spoilers without a single wrinkle on your forehead.
Your superpower is your inner vibe and unwavering harmony.
resultMessages.2:
Teleport on Call üèñÔ∏è

You're made for adventures and quick escapes‚Äîfrom the office, from routine, from awkward conversations.
With one snap of your fingers, you're on the beach with a coconut while others are still opening Zoom.
Your superpower is to disappear where it's boring and reappear where it's fun.
resultMessages.3:
Chaos-Genius ‚ö°üß†

You live by the principle ""the main thing is that it works.""
You don't need superpowers because you create magic out of chaos, coffee, and inspiration at 3 a.m.
Your superpower is finding a way out of any situation, even if there was no way in.
resultMessages.4:
Charming Energy Booster üí´

You energize everyone around you‚Äîwith your smile, your sayings, your memes, and your energy.
Even if the day is going awry, being with you makes everyone feel better.
Your superpower is making life brighter and more fun simply by being yourself.

quizInfo.firstText:
You've completed our quiz and discovered the superpower hidden within you üí´
Some people find their zen even in deadlines, some teleport to the sea in their thoughts, and some simply turn chaos into art ‚òï‚ú®

The main thing is that now you know exactly what kind of hero lives within you!
quizInfo.partnerBonus:
Superheroes deserve a reward ü¶∏‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è
Our partners have prepared a surprise that will make you feel like a hero in real life‚Äîdon't miss your chance to claim it while luck is on your side! ‚ö°

questions.text: You get a call from an unknown number. What do you do?

answers.text: I block the number faster than a ninja disappears into smoke.
I answer with the phrase, "Hello, Universe Quality Control."
I pick up the phone and feign confidence, as if I'm expected at a board meeting
I ignore it. If it's important, they'll write it down.

questions.text: How do you react when you're late for a meeting?

answers.text: I come up with a Marvel-level excuse.
I write "on my way" while still standing at home.
I rush like Flash, but with a smile.
Calm down, the main thing is to arrive in style.

questions.text: Your friend is telling the same story again.

answers.text: I interrupt with a meme to speed things up.
I play along, as if I'm hearing it for the first time.
I smile and nod, mentally flying off on vacation.
I endure it, because friendship is a test of time.

questions.text: How do you cope with stress?

answers.text: I'm starting a new project because chaos is my style.
I dance until I forget I was stressed.
Coffee, a TV show, and a warm blanket‚Äîthat's my zen.

questions.text: How do you solve problems?

data.title: Activate your fan mode - what type of fan are you?
data.description: Answer 8 situations related to matches and the fan atmosphere and discover your fan type: a quiet strategist, a loud, dedicated fan, or a joker. There are no right or wrong answers‚Äîonly fun and excitement!
data.firstPage:
8 questions, choose one option at a time.
Each option is worth 0 to 3 points.
At the end of the quiz, your score will reflect your ""fan vibe"" and your team-supporting style.

resultMessages.0-4:
A cheerful fan üéâ
You turn any match into a celebration! A goal, a miss, or the occasional team fail is a reason to laugh, cheer on your friends, and create a fun atmosphere üòÜ. There's never a dull moment with you!
resultMessages.4-7:
Believing to the end üôå
You never give up, even if your team is losing 0-5. Your motto is: ""There's a chance for a miracle until the last second!"" ‚ú® You're a fan who inspires others and keeps them hoping until the final whistle.
resultMessages.8-8:
A loud fan üéâ
You're the living embodiment of the stadium! You scream, jump, and infect everyone around you with your energy ‚ö°. For you, every match is a concert, and every goal is an excuse to start a dance flash mob.
resultMessages.9-13:
A quiet strategist üßê
You're a true master of observation! You analyze every pass, every move, and every feint, as if you were plotting world domination ‚ö°. You rarely give in to emotion, but your post-match commentary is more valuable than any meme post.

data.title: How Salty Are You?
data.description: Just for fun, not a serious test! Answer 7 everyday situations and find out your ‚Äúsaltiness‚Äù level (wittiness, humor, quick comebacks). No right/wrong ‚Äî just vibes....
data.firstPage:

data.descrip:
How to play: 7 questions, each with one choice. Every option gives 0‚Äì3 salt points. Total score = your salt profile.
Note: keep it civil, no personal attacks. 20+ audience.

resultMessages.0-6: Sweet & soft! Gentle, delicate, always makes people feel comfortable. You drop a perfect salty line only when needed.
resultMessages.7-12: Perfectly seasoned! Balanced salt level, knows exactly when to drop a clever line. Fun without being too spicy.
resultMessages.13-18: Bold & unforgettable flavor! Sharp humor, lightning-fast reactions. You always lift the group vibe.
resultMessages.19-21: Legendary salt master! Master of witty comebacks: salty but classy, savage but charming. Everyone wants your energy.
